about_the_game: The official Forgive Me Father 2 Digital Artbook invites everyone to take a deep dive into the captivating artstyle of its weapon, enemy and level design. Enjoy the never before seen concept arts, or take in the beauty of individual weapon animation frames and the game’s diverse locations, and inspect every little detail you might otherwise have missed in the middle of the frenetic boomer shooter action.
